title: Gallagher's Steakhouse
seo_description: Gallagher's is true New York experience to enjoy before or after a Broadway show. Chef Brett Reichler knows how to age a steak and he's proudly upholding the legacy of this 87-year-old restaurant. Business dinner or date night, this Theater District favorite is the perfect reservation.
content:
Steak

228 W 52nd St

walk: 4 minutes

Gallagher's is true New York experience to enjoy before or after a Broadway show. Chef Brett Reichler knows how to age a steak and he's proudly upholding the legacy of this 87-year-old restaurant. Business dinner or date night, this Theater District favorite is the perfect reservation.
